Package br.com.concepting.framework.util.helpers

Class Node

java.lang.Object
br.com.concepting.framework.util.helpers.Node
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BaseModel, XmlNode
public abstract class Node extends Object implements Serializable, Cloneable
Class that defines the basic implementation of a node to be used in a tree data structure.
Since:
1.0.0
